feed.title: Jellysweep Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Jellysweep: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 18892c92d0203e59d99feac4f57acc00e6e6408e: feat(engine): populate requester info in batches of 10 (#14) (@jon4hz)
  • e766e4ec68c3ef36ae62c92a17099a27a9fee936: feat(web): improve mobile view of dashboard (#9) (@jon4hz)

Bug fixes

  • 69536169a14f9f6a1aa0c5436dafdf09a24fdc88: fix(engine): avoid conflicting keep tags (#17) (@jon4hz)
  • 531a63e278b8d9e4f826969602c153456f21f603: fix(engine): set keep expiry to 90 days (#15) (@jon4hz)
  • 75fec7e2c82d5bf374a4935d9c0c2976e7ef1c46: fix(web): duplicated items in approval queue (#16) (@jon4hz)

Other work

  • cd5abf6ee7bb5fa6acb442a69da962f482f3f529: refactor(web): smoother and better animated webui (#13) (@jon4hz)

entry.title: New release for Jellysweep: v0.8.0
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 2dd9e9b83c8cefd9ae56dc7a9b8400b47478397b: fix(engine): leave unaired episodes monitored (#18) (@jon4hz)

Other work

  • 684213e00b3afaf20f1382abaa157845e82bdcc0: refactor: task scheduler and better caching (#21) (@jon4hz)

entry.title: New release for Jellysweep: v0.9.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • d2ff0e621260470144eb7bfda14c9c54bccd7b2b: feat(api): add endpoints for jellyfin plugin (#24) (@jon4hz)
  • 9a35d5ecfbdf8a31f16a4d2ec28db6b773a8b6cb: feat(engine): add size threshold filter (#22) (@jon4hz)

Documentation updates

  • aaa2e8da43124016218edd77045bc56b97c8e327: docs: update docs with cleanup_schedule (#25) (@jon4hz)

entry.title: New release for Jellysweep: v0.10.0
entry.content:
Changelog

üí• Breaking Changes

  • 9808412df7b921a9149cb4e6309b0abd5f9b9bff: feat(engine)!: add support for streamystats (#35) (@jon4hz)
  • 5fcb9f125e32d30bef625aa76b9636e1161930aa: feat(engine)!: cleanup delay based on disk usage (#37) (@jon4hz)

üêõ Bug fixes
